Feeds WET plugin

Example

Code

<div id="cdn-feeds">
</div>
<!-- Write closure template --><>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var feeds = document.getElementById("cdn-feeds");
	feeds.outerHTML = wet.plugins.feeds({
		title: "Road News Releases and Safety Recalls",
		limit: 5,
		feeds: [{
			href: "http://www.tc.gc.ca/mediaroom/rss/road.xml",
			text: "Road News Releases (All)"
		},{
			href: "http://wwwapps.tc.gc.ca/Saf-Sec-Sur/7/VRDB-BDRV/search-recherche/rss.aspx?lang=eng",
			text: "Road Safety Recalls",
		}]
	});
</script>

Parameters

Parameter Role Mandatory
title Title of the feeds Yes
limit Controls the amount of items the Web feeds widget will display Yes
href Link to the RSS feed Yes
text Description of the feed Yes
